mapper.select: SELECT T1.PRTNR_KNM || '(' || T1.PRTNR_NO || ')' AS EMPL_NM , T1.OG_NM AS BLG , T1.PRTNR_NO , CD.CD_CNTN AS RSB , NVL( ( SELECT DISTINCT PM.PERF_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_PRTNR_PERF_MM_CL PM /*순주문집계 확정 테이블*/ WHERE PM.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND PM.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND PM.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND PM.PERF_ATC_CD = 'W01P00012' /*미팅참석일수*/ AND PM.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' /*P추진단순주문실적생성*/ ) ,0 ) AS METG /*출석일수*/ , CD2.CD_CNTN AS QLF , NVL(T2.INTBS_SUM,0) AS INTBS_SUM , NVL(T2.DDTN_SUM,0) AS DDTN_SUM , NVL(T2.ACL_DSB_AMT,0) AS ACL_DSB_AMT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT E.PRTNR_NO , E.OG_TP_CD , SUM(E.INTBS_AMT) AS INTBS_SUM , SUM(E.DDCTAM) AS DDTN_SUM , SUM(E.DSB_OJ_AMT) AS ACL_DSB_AMT FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ E WHERE E.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} AND ( E.INTBS_AMT > 0 OR E.DDCTAM > 0 OR E.DSB_OJ_AMT> 0 ) AND E.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND E.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' GROUP BY E.PRTNR_NO, E.OG_TP_CD )T2 ON T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D CD ON T1.RSB_DV_CD = CD.CD_VLD_VAL AND CD.CD_ID = 'RSB_DV_CD' AND CD.TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D CD2 ON T1.QLF_DV_CD = CD2.CD_ID AND CD2.CD_ID = 'QLF_DV_CD' AND CD2.TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*W01~03 P,M,홈마스터*/ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no}

SELECT P1.INDV_ELHM , P1.INDV_ELHM_EXCP , P1.INDV_ADP , P1.INDV_ELHM_CHDVC , P1.INDV_MUTU , P2.OG_ELHM , P2.OG_ELHM_EXCP , P2.OG_ADP , P2.OG_MUTU FROM ( SELECT #{no} AS PRTNR_NO , NVL(ELHM, 0) AS INDV_ELHM /* 개인가전 : W01P00001 */ , NVL(ELHM_EXCP, 0) AS INDV_ELHM_EXCP /* 개인가전외 : W01P00004 */ , ELHM + ELHM_EXCP AS INDV_ADP /* 개인합산 */ , NVL(ELHM_CHDVC, 0) AS INDV_ELHM_CHDVC /* 가전기변 : W00P00028 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(FEE_ATC_VAL), 0) FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ F1 WHERE F1.FEE_CD = 'W010021' AND F1.DSB_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND F1.CO_CD = T1.CO_CD AND F1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND F1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD) AS INDV_MUTU /* 개인상조 */ FROM ((SELECT PERF_ATC_CD , PERF_VAL , BASE_YM , CO_CD , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , FEE_TCNT_DV_CD FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL S1 /*순주문 파트너 실적 월마감*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND S1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*웰스 P조직*/ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND S1.PERF_DV_CD = 0 AND S1.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W01P00001', 'W01P00004', 'W00P00028') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PERF_ATC_CD IN('W01P00001' AS ELHM, 'W01P00004' AS ELHM_EXCP, 'W00P00028' AS ELHM_CHDVC) )) T1 ) P1 JOIN ( SELECT #{no} AS PRTNR_NO , NVL(ELHM, 0) AS OG_ELHM /* 조직가전 : W01P00001 */ , NVL(ELHM_EXCP, 0) AS OG_ELHM_EXCP /* 조직가전외 : W01P00004 */ , ELHM + ELHM_EXCP AS OG_ADP /* 조직합산 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(FEE_ATC_VAL), 0) FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ F2 WHERE F2.FEE_CD = 'W010022' AND F2.DSB_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND F2.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD AND F2.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND F2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD) AS OG_MUTU /* 조직상조 */ FROM ((SELECT PERF_ATC_CD , PERF_VAL , BASE_YM , CO_CD , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , FEE_TCNT_DV_CD FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL S1 /*순주문 파트너 실적 월마감*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND S1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*웰스 P조직*/ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND S1.PERF_DV_CD = 2 AND S1.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W01P00001', 'W01P00004', 'W00P00028') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PERF_ATC_CD IN('W01P00001' AS ELHM, 'W01P00004' AS ELHM_EXCP, 'W00P00028' AS ELHM_CHDVC) )) T2 ) P2 ON P1.PRTNR_NO = P2.PRTNR_NO

SELECT ITEM1, FVAL1, ITEM2,FVAL2, ITEM3, FVAL3 FROM ( /* 기타 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM3 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL3 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '07' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 07 : 기타수수료 */ ) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN ( /* 개인 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM1 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL1 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '02' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 02 : 개인수수료 */ ) A2 ON A2.SN = A1.SN FULL OUTER JOIN ( /* 조직 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM2 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL2 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '03' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 03 : 조직수수료 */ ) A3 ON A3.SN = NVL(A1.SN, A2.SN)

SELECT NVL(RDS, 0) AS RDS , NVL(ERNTX, 0) AS ERNTX , NVL(RSDNTX, 0) AS RSDNTX , NVL(HIR_INSR, 0) AS HIR_INSR , NVL(BU_DDTN, 0) AS BU_DDTN , NVL(PNPYAM, 0) AS PNPYAM , NVL(INDD_INSR, 0) AS INDD_INSR FROM ( SELECT T2.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 02 : 공제 */ ) PIVOT ( SUM(FEE_ATC_VAL) FOR FEE_DDTN_TP_CD IN ('01' AS RDS, '02' AS ERNTX, '03' AS RSDNTX, '04' AS HIR_INSR, '05' AS BU_DDTN, '06' AS PNPYAM, '07' AS INDD_INSR) )

SELECT M.DIV , M.ITEM , M.CTR_BF , M.CTR_AF , M.RSN , M.CTR_DTM , A.PRTNR_KNM AS CTRR FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A INNER JOIN ( SELECT '공제' AS DIV , B.FEE_DDTN_TP_NM AS ITEM , A.FEE_DDCTAM AS CTR_BF , A.FEE_DDTN_CNFM_AMT AS CTR_AF , A.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN AS RSN , A.FNL_MDFC_DTM AS CTR_DTM , A.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD AS FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD , A.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AS FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DDTN_IZ A INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DDTN_TP_CD B ON A.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = B.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD AND B.APY_STRT_YM <= #{perfYm} WHERE A.DDTN_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*P조직*/ AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND A.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND A.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = '01' UNION ALL SELECT '수수료' AS DIV , B.FEE_NM AS ITEM , A.FEE_CALC_AMT AS CTR_BF , A.FEE_CTR_CNFM_AMT AS CTR_AF , A.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN AS RSN , A.FNL_MDFC_DTM AS CTR_DTM , A.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD AS FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD , A.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AS FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS A INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD B ON A.FEE_CD = B.FEE_CD WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*P조직*/ AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND A.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND A.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = '01' )M ON A.PRTNR_NO = M.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AND A.OG_TP_CD = M.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} ORDER BY M.DIV, M.ITEM
